name: Pixel Medimon
description:
Pixel Medimon is a game where you battle monsters in the world  with your own to become stronger so that you can deliver your sister that got kidnapped.

This is a School project that I've been working on using GB Studio.

All the assets apart from 2 scenes were made by me with Piskel and Tiled.

The game itself and the characters were inspired by Pokémon from Nintendo. 

The other assets were inspired by other pixelated art found on the internet, but adapted to fit into my game.
